page.title: 08FARMING CONTD
page.content: outdoors but now the industry is carried out under glass with daffodils being one of the few crops still grown outdoors.The most common flowers produced are carnations and freesia.{ {AGRICULTURE}This activity is almost non-existent in the area and hay is basically the only crop although some maize and other fodder crops are grown.{FISHING}The main fishing industry is situated in the north but bream,garfish,mullet,mackerel and pollack can be caught off the south coast.Three types of wrasse can be caught,these fish like a rocky,seaweed covered bottom,as do crabs.Both chancres (shankers) and spider crabs (which are not found on the mainland) and lobsters are caught in pots from May to October.
